testcase.name: Login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to the login page......................................passed When User enters valid credentials and clicks on login button...............passed Then User should land on dashboard page.....................................passed

testcase.name: Login with invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to the login page......................................passed When User enters invalid credentials and clicks on login button.............passed Then User should see error message..........................................passed
